name: Bread-And-Cheese Soup
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, quick, soups and stews
recipeIngredient: 6 cups fresh or frozen homemade chicken stock (recipe follows)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the chicken stock to a strong boil and add the salt and pepper. Meanwhile, break the toast into pieces and place the equivalent of 1 slice in each of four soup bowls. Divide the cheese among the bowls, sprinkle with the ground pepper and pour the boiling stock on top. Serve immediately.
